# archestra_profile (Resource)

Manages an Archestra profile (formerly agent).

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "archestra_profile" "example" {
  name = "production-agent"

  labels = [
    {
      key   = "environment"
      value = "production"
    },
    {
      key   = "team"
      value = "backend"
    },
    {
      key   = "region"
      value = "us-west-2"
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the profile

### Optional

- `labels` (Attributes List) Labels to organize and identify the profile (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--labels))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Profile identifier

<a id="nestedatt--labels"></a>
### Nested Schema for `labels`

Required:

- `key` (String) Label key
- `value` (String) Label value
